name: ti-flow-monorepo
description: TI-Flow Healthcare Systems - Pharmacy, Doctor, and Backend Services

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:pharmacy" "npm run dev:doctor"
scripts.build: npm run build:pharmacy && npm run build:doctor
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/pharmacy && npm install && cd ../doctor && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run preview:pharmacy" "npm run preview:doctor"
